Dear All,

A friend of mine has a lovely fuchigashira by Shigeharu.  I'm a blade man and don't have so many fittings books, certainly not the "bibles", so I have trawled the web looking for info on Shigeharu and have found nothing so far.  Does anyone have any info on this artisan that they could post on the list??

With thanks,

Barry Thomas
(Melbourne, Australia)
